A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Star Wars: The Last Jedi (2017) is bold\, visually-impressive\, and filled with memorable moments. The writers take the characters into interesting new directions that may either surprisingly please or enrage fans. Despite some questionable narrative choices\, these bold developments may stimulate original and creative ideas to further enrich the mythology of the Star Wars franchise in future installments. However\, such elements also present inconsistencies with narrative continuity. The Last Jedi showcases an effective manipulation of sound and silence\, accompanied by its striking imageries\, to take the audience on an exciting and thrilling ride. Its breath-taking VFX\, brave creative choices\, exhilirating action sequences\, and John William's signature score outweigh the film's apparent flaws.
